name: Input.GetKey()
description:
How to play
- At the beginning of the game, you'll have the button arrows key to use it to move your character in the game.
- Survey into the game to get more button that random in the game to unlock your other skills.
- But your current button can be broken by the enemy.
- You can store the button by drag your mouse to current button you used and drag it to button inventory at the down of the screen.
- Defeat the enemy to get scores. - When you have the button. when you get hit by the enemy, enemy will be dead and hp of the button that was attacked by the enemy will be decrease
- Whan your character get hit without button, you will Game Over.

the color of button is
Blue = movement direction
Yellow = 1 bullet you can use 3 time Red = 1 bomb you can use 3 time
Purple = 1 spread bullet you can use 3 time
